scripts.build-static: cp ../static/icon.png public && sass index.scss public/index.css && cp node_modules/@thinktool/client/dist/app.css public
scripts.build: npm run build-static && next build && next export
scripts.link-client: npm ci && npm link ../client && npm link node_modules/@thinktool/client/node_modules/react && npm link node_modules/@thinktool/client/node_modules/react-dom
